Files used by buildozer

By default, buildozer stores its files under $HOME/.buildbox directory.

Following are few most important files and locations below that directory:

bin/zerlauncher for the buildozer utility
maven-repo/separate maven repository with libraries
var/buildozer/graph.xmldependency graph of latest build
var/buildozer/log/buildozer.logdetailed log of latest build
var/modules.txtmodule registry
